latex-workshop.latex.tools.name: lualatex-with-build-dir
args: cd %DIR% && mkdir -p .latex-build && lualatex -shell-escape -interaction=nonstopmode -file-line-error -output-directory=.latex-build %DOCFILE%.tex && cp .latex-build/%DOCFILE%.pdf %DOCFILE%.pdf && rm -f %DOCFILE%.aux %DOCFILE%.log %DOCFILE%.nav %DOCFILE%.out %DOCFILE%.snm %DOCFILE%.toc %DOCFILE%.bbl %DOCFILE%.blg %DOCFILE%.synctex.gz %DOCFILE%.fls %DOCFILE%.fdb_latexmk %DOCFILE%.bcf %DOCFILE%.run.xml || true
